text: See also: 27th century BC in architecture, other events of the 26th century BC, 25th century BC in architecture, and the timeline of architecture. ==Buildings and structures== ===Buildings=== * c. 2580 BC the Pyramid of Khufu, the oldest and largest of the three great pyramids in the Giza Necropolis, is completed * c. 2532 BC the Pyramid of Khafre, in the Giza Necropolis, is completed * the Pyramid of Menkaure, in the Giza Necropolis, is completed * the Great Sphinx of Giza is completed * Architecture
title: 26th century BC in architecture
